title: Daikin Kirara Sense
slogan: The evolution of interior comfort, with an intelligent sensor. Maximum efficiency Japanese technology for your home.
details: It offers models with capacities of 2,500, 3,500, 5,000, and 6,000.
Motion sensor to orient the air flow and anticipate the thermal load.
Quickly reach the desired temperature, both in cold and heat modes.
Automatic control of air flow. Manual selection of 5 speeds.
With the ECO mode and the intelligent sensor, it allows even more energy savings than the standard Inverter Mini Split.
Uses R-410a refrigerant since it has no impact on the environment.

title: Daikin Inverter Mini Split
slogan: Designed to air condition all household environments with the maximum level of energy efficiency.
details: It offers models with capacities of 2,500, 3,500, 5,500 and 6,300W.
Motion sensor to orient the air flow and anticipate the thermal load.
Quickly reach the desired temperature, both in cold and heat modes.
Automatic control of air flow. Manual selection of 5 speeds.
The ECO mode and intelligent sensor allow for even more energy savings than the standard Inverter Mini Split.
Uses R-410a refrigerant since it has no impact on the environment.

title: Daikin Premium Inverter Multi Split
slogan: A high-performance and energy-efficient outdoor unit that allows for connection of up to 5 different types of indoor units.
details: It offers models with capacities of 2,500, 3,500, 5,000, 6,000 and 7,100W.
A single outdoor unit can be connected to up to 5 indoor units.
Includes air filtering and purification elements.
Offers options for indoor units: wall-mounted, cassette, and under silhouette for ducts.
Reduces the physical space that outdoor units would occupy.
Uses R-410a refrigerant since it has no impact on the environment.

title: Daikin Multi-Split Inverter
slogan: Ideal for air conditioning all the rooms in your home with a single outdoor unit.
details: It offers models with a capacity of 2,500, 3,500, and 5,000W.
It allows you to connect up to 4 indoor units.
Includes air filtering and purification elements.
It can save up to 40% of electricity consumption.
It has the minimum noise level and does not generate annoying noises.
Uses R-410a refrigerant as it has no impact on the environment.

title: VRV SMALL
slogan: The most efficient system on the market in its small version that allows air conditioning up to 14 rooms with multiple interior designs.
details: It has models with capacities from 4 to 9 HP.
High performance coefficient and energy savings.
6 types and 18 models of residential indoor units.
Multiple options in control systems.
Silent operation in night mode.
Design flexibility and easy installation.
Uses R-410a refrigerant and has no impact on the environment.

title: Mini Chiller Inverter
slogan: Hot water generator for heating your home.
details: Do you need an air conditioning system that does not require natural gas?
Mini Chiller Inverter: Maximum efficiency and care for the environment. Equipment with no emission of polluting gases.
Maximum efficiency and care for the environment. Equipment with no emission of polluting gases.
Maximum efficiency with 0% combustion.
Heat pump system: AEROTHERMY.
Unique system: heating and cooling.
Sustainable: high energy savings and reduced environmental impact.
Operation -15°C to 45°C.
External condensing unit, not occupying interior space.
100% electric. Ideal for areas with no gas supply.
Modular equipment for up to 8 units.
Low noise level.
Connection with fan coils and radiant floor heating.
Compatible with solar panels.
Silence is Comfort
Our residential mini chiller was designed with the end user in mind.
We worked on 8 different points of noise reduction technology to achieve one of the quietest systems on the market.
The Cold Battle
This system offers a renewable, all-in-one heating and cooling solution, ideal for both cold and warm climates.
It uses outside air to provide the necessary heating capacity, even in temperatures as low as -15°C.

title: Ducted Fan Coil
slogan: Maximum efficiency taking up the smallest possible space. Its extremely silent units adapt easily to any environment.
details: Slim design, only 24cm high, is the ideal solution for small spaces.
Invisible air conditioning embedded in the ceiling.
Optimal air distribution.
Low-pressure model with discharge condensate tray.
Suitable for air conditioning and heating.
Intelligent Touch Screen control.
Wide range of capacities from 2 to 8 KW.
Easy maintenance with washable nylon filter and full posterior return.

title:
Sky Air Inverter
Is it on?
slogan: It's not heard. It doesn't impact the environment. And it ensures the perfect climate. Discover the new generation of sustainable inverter equipment.

details: 100% Sustainable Equipment
In 2012, DAIKIN discovered R-32, the most efficient refrigerant generation on the market today, with significant advantages in terms of efficiency, profitability, and environmental care.
The impact that this refrigerant has on global warming is one-third that of conventional refrigerants. This makes it the most efficient on the market.

Energy savings.
Sustainable technology.
Reduced CO2 emissions.

To date, there are more than 110 million air conditioning units using this technology in more than 100 countries around the world. The goal is unique and clear: to continue growing in countries that adopt this technology on the path to carbon neutrality.
Inverter Under Silhouette
The most complete line of under silhouette equipment for commercial applications:
Capacities of 3 and 5TR.
Invisible air conditioning: embedded in the ceiling.
Built-in drain pump.
Double drainage protection.
Re-Start function.
Cassette Inverter
The new generation of Daikin Cassette units has arrived in Argentina. Maximum innovation and performance.
Capacities of 3 and 5tr.
Excellent air distribution thanks to its 360° flow.
Low noise level.
Wireless remote control.
Inverter Floor Ceiling
Sky Air Advance also offers high-performance Inverter Ceiling options. Discover its benefits:
Capacities of 3 and 5TR.
Installation flexibility (on the floor or on the ceiling).
Automatic air swing.
Self-diagnostic function.

title: Sky Air
slogan: The most complete line of solutions in separate systems for commercial applications.

details: Under Silhouette
The most complete line of under silhouette equipment for commercial applications:
Capacities of 2, 3, 4 and 5TR.
Invisible air conditioning: embedded in the ceiling.
Double drainage protection.
Re-Start function.
Cassette
The new generation of Daikin Cassette units with excellent air distribution.
Capacity 4TR.
Excellent air distribution thanks to its 360° flow.
Low noise level.
Wireless remote control.
Incorporated drainage pump.
Floor Ceiling
Sky Air also presents high-performance Floor and Ceiling options. Discover their benefits:
Capacities of 3 and 5TR.
Installation flexibility (on the floor or on the ceiling).
Automatic air swing.
Self-diagnosis function.
Easy maintenance.

title: Packaged
slogan: Wide range of solutions for commercial and industrial projects.

details: Commercial Split Systems
Heat pump units with modular condensers (6-50TR). Refrigerant R-407c.
Gas Rooftops
Gas-fired heat pump units with refrigerant R-410a (7.5-20TR).
Heat Pump Rooftops
Heat pump units with refrigerant R-407c (7-35TR) and refrigerant R-410a (8-22TR).

title: Control Systems
slogan: Air equipment management has never been easier. Discover the ultimate level of control:
details: The area configuration simplifies the detailed management of the VRV system.
Displays the origin of previous unit operations.
Remote access to the equipment with the same type of Intelligent Touch Manager displays.
The visualization of plans allows for quick searches of units.
The Energy Navigator function analyzes consumption and identifies inefficient operations.
Authorized users can centrally control individual air units.
